definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Data compression has been a technique of indispensability in times of information.
sentences.chinese: 數據壓縮已經成爲信息時代必不可少的一項技術。

sentences.english: Modern cartology has new contents and new growth points in information era.
sentences.chinese: 信息時代賦予現代地圖學新的內容，新的生長點。

sentences.english: We're in an era of information.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在處在一個信息時代。

sentences.english: Today' s information age is hot for the unity of these terms.
sentences.chinese: 統一科技名詞術語，是當前信息時代的緊迫要求。

sentences.english: There are worse ways to prepare for life in an information age.
sentences.chinese: 在信息時代裏生活的話，沒有比研究更好的方式了。

sentences.english: The advent of the Age of Information brings about bright prospects to TEFL.
sentences.chinese: 信息時代的到來爲英語教學的發展帶來新的契機。

sentences.english: White Hat hackers are the unsung heroes of the Information Age.
sentences.chinese: 紅客是信息時代的無名英雄。

sentences.english: In today’s Information Age, reading is now a prerequisite for success in life.
sentences.chinese: 在當今信息時代，閱讀現在是取得成功的先決條件。

sentences.english: The advent of the information epoch demands to remold the librarians.
sentences.chinese: 信息時代的到來，要求重新塑造圖書館員的形象。

sentences.english: An increasing number of people are joining the "Information Age " via the Internet .
sentences.chinese: 越來越多白勺人通過互聯網進入了“信息時代”。

sentences.english: Of course, there is no going back to the agrarian past.
sentences.chinese: 當然，從信息時代退回到農耕時代是不可能的。

sentences.english: The development trend of the mass communication industry in China- mainland is fast, which means the information era has come.
sentences.chinese: 我國的大衆傳媒業發展之勢迅猛，信息時代已經到來。

sentences.english: Do you feel overwhelmed and under-prepared for the information age?
sentences.chinese: 你是否覺得你還無法良好地應付這個信息時代？

sentences.english: The improvement of the living standards of people in IT times is calling an overall modern furniture de- sign.
sentences.chinese: 信息時代人民生活水平的改變呼喚整體廚房傢俱設計。

sentences.english: His plan nudged the information times coming early.
sentences.chinese: 他的規劃促進了信息時代的早日到來。

pinyin: li4 shi3 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: lit. so loud that even the deaf can hear (idiom); rousing even the apathetic
Iron Curtain (1945-1991) (in Taiwan, 鐵幕 was used to refer to both the Iron Curtain and the Bamboo Curtain)
to shoot without aim (idiom); fig. to speak without thinking/firing blindly/to shoot in the air/a shot in the dark
